meanings.sent1: Watching violent movies can deprave young minds.
meanings.sent2: The evil villain tried to deprave the hero's pure heart.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat seemed to deprave the innocent puppy with its bad behavior.
meanings.sent4: The dark influence of the city began to deprave the once kind-hearted man.
meanings.sent5: The sinister cult leader used manipulation to deprave his followers into committing crimes.

meanings.sent1: The power of greed can deprave even the most honest individuals.
meanings.sent2: The twisted magician sought to deprave the laws of nature.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey tried to deprave the orderly arrangement of the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The toxic environment began to deprave the once pristine river.
meanings.sent5: The forbidden knowledge threatened to deprave the curious minds of the students.
